iframemovie: The AppleÂ® movie format, iFrame, makes it   easier and quicker to import and upload videos while retaining high image   quality.
lightsensitivity: ISO 120, ISO 1600, ISO 200, ISO 400, ISO 80, ISO 800
cameraflashfeatures: Auto Flash, Red-eye Reduction Flash, Slow Sync
additionalfeatures: AF Tracking, Blink Detection, Face Detection, Not Interchangeable Lenses, Red-eye Correction, USB 2.0
portrait: The camera sets a large aperture, focusing   the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject   âpop.â
aperturepriority: You set the aperture, controlling   depth-of-field. The camera automatically selects the shutter   speed.
monochrome: Choose from three single-tone effects:   Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue.
landscape: Increases depth-of-field for sharp and   sweeping landscape shots.
specialeffects: Color Accent, Color Swap, Fisheye, Miniature, Monochrome, Posterization, Toy camera, Vivid
smartshutter: The camera automatically takes the photo   when people smile, wink, or get into frame.
movie: Record video in stereo sound. Unwanted   scenes can be deleted in playback mode.
snow: Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened   subjects or an unnatural bluish tint.
program: Access advanced exposure compensation   features while shooting mostly automatically.
discreetmode: Disables flash, AF assist beam, and all   camera sounds with one mode dial setting â so you can capture images in quiet   areas.
beach: Beach Get clear shots of people at a sunny   beach without darkened faces.
fisheyeeffect: Add a classic photo distortion without a   fisheye lens.
fireworks: Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing   fireworks.
shutterpriority: You select the shutter speed to stop or blur   action, and the camera finds the appropriate aperture. With slow exposure   times, Canon's noise reduction system activates to ensure low image noise.
smartauto: The camera automatically selects the best   shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental   factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity.
lowlight: For high quality image capture in an amazing   range of dimly-lit situations.
toycameraeffect: Simulates photos taken with "toy"   or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette   effect.
manual: You have complete contrl of exposure,   selecting both aperture and shutter speed manually.
postereffect: Poster Effect combines several similar   shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching,   scene-popping contrasts.
supportedflashmemory: Eye-Fi card, SD Card, SD Memory Card, SDHC Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Card, SDXC Memory Card
